ModMetaData.name: Retexturedapparelnopawns1.5
ModMetaData.author: Chad
ModMetaData.description:
Higher resolution textures for base game apparel.
Includes: - body and face textures - bowler hat, cowboy hat, tuque - duster, jacket, parka - t-shirt, button-down shirt - tribalwear - flak helmet, simple helmet - flak jacket, flak vest
